title: LARGE STUDIO IN BROWNSTONE
posting_body: ['LARGE STUDIO in beautiful Harlem brownstone.', 'Charming and spacious garden view studio apartment in Victorian brownstone in central Harlem.', ' Original detail.', ' Floor to ceiling dressing cabinet.', ' Decorative fireplace.', ' Hardwood floors throughout.', 'Sunny and quiet.', 'Approx 500sf.', 'Skylight in Kitchen.', 'Decorative fireplace.', 'FREE use of Washer/Dryer in common space.', ' Owner pays water, owner supplied gas heat and oven.', ' Tenant pays electric and any other utilities.', 'Conveniently located near all forms of NYC transportation, shopping and restaurants.', 'On major bus lines.', 'Near 2/3/4/5/6 trains, and steps to Metro-North train.', 'Near Whole Foods, Shake Shack, Chipotle, H and M;', '10-12minutes to LaGuardia Airport.', 'Excellent street parking.', 'Sorry, no pets, service or emotional support animals due to landlord allergies.', 'Credit and background checks are required as part of the application process.', 'Minimum income $50,000.', ' Proof of income and government issued ID are required to schedule viewings.', 'No Smoking and No brokers; No fee.']
